alerts.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 3:32PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
alerts.description:
A weak storm system passing to our north on Tuesday will bring
with it a risk for patchy light freezing drizzle or flurries
during the Tuesday pre-dawn hours into the rest of Tuesday
morning. The anticipated spotty coverage of freezing drizzle
should minimize impacts, although unpaved roads, sidewalks and
elevated bridges could still become slippery. Use caution if
traveling Tuesday morning.
